items.name: case authorizationDenied
items.desc: The app isn’t authorized to perform the requested operation.

items.name: case classKitUnavailable
items.desc: ClassKit isn’t available on this device.

items.name: case databaseInaccessible
items.desc: ClassKit isn’t accessible because the device is locked.

items.name: case invalidArgument
items.desc: An invalid argument was provided to the API.

items.name: case invalidCreate
items.desc: An attempt to save a new object that already exists in the data store failed.

items.name: case invalidModification
items.desc: An attempt to modify a read-only object failed.

items.name: case invalidUpdate
items.desc: ClassKit failed to save an updated object in the data store.

items.name: case partialFailure
items.desc: ClassKit encountered more than one error.
